content.detailedDescription: The objects appeared outside of the house, blinking red lights with no sound.  we could her a jet in the distance.  as the jet approached the red lights became erratic and sped off.  they moved faster then that of the jet.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: One of many

content.detailedDescription: I was in johnston,r.I. traveling south on i295 at appox 5:00am 3/27/12.  i saw fairly low in the sky what looked like white squigly shaped 'clouds' in a north to south direction and relatively short in length.  plus they seemed to be brighter than a cloud should be. suddenly i saw a dull white light heading south next to the existing 'clouds', and it was leaving a trail that was identical to the other 'clouds' and went for the same length as the others.  the light disappeared and showed up next to  that 'cloud' and repeated making another squigly shaped 'cloud' and together there was five of these 'clouds' when the activity stopped and i continued traveling towards hartford,ct on rte. 6. i observed this for appox. 15 minutes.
content.summary: Ufo activity near johnston,r.I.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home from fullerton area in california on the 60fwy early one morning around 3am. i was going eastward.I had just cleared a treeline and after a moment i realized that the valley that was usually bright-ish at nite wasn't as bright as it normally was. i looked left and wondered at the differences.  i had never really studied the valley but it looked wrong...Like there was a strip all the way across the valley blocking the city lights... i saw these reddish orange lights spreading almost from the freeway all the way to the other side. it almost seemed level with the freeway and maybe a bit below. it was like the only sound i could hear was the sound of my automobile. i checked my digital when i first recognized i was looking at some wierd silent very slow moving flying object. i looked at the digital clock afterwards too to make sure i didn't "loose time". unfortunately i don't remember the exact time; just that it was just a few minutes after i had checked it. (so no loss of time) 
   when i first saw it it was so big it took me awhile to recognize that it was all attached and moving together. i didn't know what i was looking at until i started to actually looked at the row of lights that seemed like they were all in a row spreading from me strait across... then i started looking at what the lights were attached to. it was dark in color and boomerang like; metalic.  it seemed so silent and so huge!!! 
   then i moved to las vegas in october 2003. i was talking to one of my friends/rmmt about this object last year; 2011.  i drew a picture on a napkin and showed him.  he went online and then after about half and hour called me back into the room and showed me this thing that apparently was on tv and i said, "oh my god! that's it!".  he was showing me the "arizona lights".  of course this totally was like wow and i saw it in california. 
   i've always thought there was life far more advanced than us and that night cemented my belief. i lost site of it only because i was so tired and really needed sleep and just kept driving towards redlands near sanberdo. don't think the tv showed it from my perspective; the end of the wing tip...And it seemed to be one single curved wing...
content.summary: Not just az drivin@night &noticed 2my left almost freeway level...There's a slight valley.Going east 2wds redlands ca frm fullerton.Kept2myslf.Talkd/ friend 2011 about&drew/napkin friend found it online.It was the slow&silent az ufo.

content.detailedDescription: I am a fishing guide in the middle keys, and in the pursuit of fish, frequently run into the backcountry in the early morning darkness to pick up anglers at various marinas, to get to spots before they are pressured by other boats.  the first time i saw the hovering light near crab key, on the bay side of islamorada, it was about 5 a.M., dark, moonless, and cloudless.  the light was so low to the water that i thought it might be a sailboat mast anchor light.  it appeared to be about 2 miles away.  it remained lit for about one minute, then shut off.  the estimated position of the light was directly in my travel route, but when i arrived at the approximate spot, the light had changed position to the west, and was at a slightly higher altitude.  it remained "on" for about 30 seconds, and shut off.  it had moved that distance in only a couple of minutes, and both times was hovering with no movement.  i thought about what i had seen, and reviewed the possibilities.  it was not a sailboat light, the surrounding area is far too shallow to allow a keeled sailing vessel to navigate, and the second sighting was far too high for a mast.  not like any airplane or helicopter i have ever seen, no flashing lights, nothing recognizable.  about 3 months later, i had a very similar experience in about the same square 5 mile area.  once again, i could not say what this object was.  then about 8 months later, again i was alone, i had my best and closest encounter.  i answered the size question on the description of the encounter with a couple of observations, because i have seen the object at different distances.  this particular morning was again cloudless, moonless and windless.  i run with a powerful spotlight in hand to light up any flotsam or other potential hazards to navigation.  the familiar light appeared about one mile ahead, and then went out.  i decided to shut off all of my nav lights, and go to the spot, shut off the motor, and sit.  the object appeared suddenly what looked like only several hundred feet away, to the north, and slightly elevated. i was only a few degress away from being under it!!  it was completely silent, and was round, disc shaped, and had a few degrees of height, being more in surfaced area on the bottom, and slightly narrower at the top.  it was the size of a medium airplane, meaning maybe 80-100 feet long and wide, and maybe 15 feet high. it was internally lit, and that light seemed to radiate outward from the object.  i decided to light it up with my q-beam.  i hit the switch, and nothing visibly changed in the scene.  within 5 seconds, the object was gone, and all lighing was also gone.  i searched the air with my spotlight and found nothing.  less than 10 seconds later, the object appeared again, at the same altitude (as nearly as i could tell) about 2 miles away.  there was no noise from any motor or engine.  the next three times i saw the object was at a distance of 2-4 miles, and was with anglers on the boat.  one was a pilot who looked at it and observed that it did not look like a plane, helicopter, baloon, satellite, ect.  i have told a very few people about this, but i did check with a friend who is an officer with the fwc, our local on water law enforcement.  i ran into her a couple of times within a few days of some of these sightings, and asked her if they, or dea, or customs had anything going on back there.  she said for sure, no.  i thought later about being out there in the dark with this object and questioned my judgement, particularly the times when i moved closer to it.  funny thing, when it is there, there is no fear at the time.  i do not know what it is, but look forward to seeing it again. i would like to remain anonomyous for now, but would welcome any inquiries directly if it could help explain what i saw to me or others.  i will gladly supply a sketch upon request.  thank you
content.summary: I have witnessed this object 7 times now over about 2 years, twice with other people, one of whom is a pilot.

content.detailedDescription: I went outside to watch a thunderstorm that just went over clare mi to the north of me. i seen something in the sky to my left so i started to watch it. it was phasing from red to yellow and had no sound what so ever. i realized it wasn't a plane or a helicopter so i ran inside and grabbed my camera. my girlfriends son was on the computer so i told him to come check it out. he came i started filming then he said there is another one. i told him to get his mom. she came out and seen it too. they were moving from east to west just below the edge of the storm clouds casting a little light on the clouds. they seemed kind of egg shaped not round. sorry i didn't upload the video but not sure how to yet. i was just blown away by what i seen because i usually can put some kind of explanation to things but this i am drawing a blank.
content.summary: 2 lights changing from red to yellow no blinking below the edge of a storm heading east to west silently

content.detailedDescription: Hi out there. my girlfriend at the time and i were on salt creek state beach near dana point,ca, sitting on a rock, we watched the sunset, then stayed listening to the waves, when i noticed a light to the south,towards camp pendelton, which is probably 30 miles to the south. this light seemed maybe between3 to 10 miles away, i thought it as just a boat on the water, as it just sat there on the water for a long time, then as i was watching it, it shot straight up into the air and hovered for a few seconds, then began doing circles and maneuvers up and down left and right, as if you were using a laser pointer on a wall, like people do making squiggly lines all around, it was moving fast, unbelievably fast,the only reason i believed my eyes was i was watching it, and i pointed it out to the girl i was with, and also to a random person walking on the sand. all three of us were amazed. this movements continued for about 30 to 40 minutes, then began to fade away as the movements slowed down. it did not cast a reflection on the surface of the water that i remembered. it was the most amazing thing i have ever seen. the next night i went back about the same time, just after sunset, and again it was there, but only for about 15 minutes before it disappeared.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Light over the ocean just off shore, hovered, then shot straight up into the air, hundreds of feet, then did fantastic maneuvers.

content.detailedDescription: It was about 7pm cst on the 25th of march, 2012. my wife and i both saw several redish-orange orbs in the sky, aprox 1500 ft. they were moving away, up the i-90 corridor. what got my attention as a inactive officer for the us air force, was the two jets in a circle observer pattern flying around the objects, one of each side, about a half mile away from the objects. it was clear that whatever these were, they were of interest to our military. this was around the old medina air force base, which used to be a missile silo before it was annexed by lackland.
content.summary: Multiple red/orange lights in a tight pattern over 90/1604, aprox 1500 ft. 2 jets in circle pattern around objects.

content.detailedDescription: I was in front of my home returning from an event where i was taking photos.  i had a flip camera in hand and a smart phone.  something caught my eye. i looked up.  it was an overhead sighting. intermittent low clouds. dark night. stars, no moon. observed starlike object moving very slowly. it shimmered white light. low to high to low intensity. it moved, stopped, hovered, changed direction, oscillated in place, moved again.  i am an experienced astronomer and know the night sky and constellations. as i continued to observe it, an airliner passed at a much lower altitude but both within eye shot so i could compare the lights.  the plane lights did not compare to the object at all.  i saw the object as spheric in shape in comparison.  star like. i thought it could be a satellite, until it changed direction, stopped and oscillated.  then it appeared to shrink in place.  but i realized it must have ascended and appeared to be getting smaller, until it disappeared from all view.  i shot three photos with my phone camera.  it was too dark but the data recorded:  gps latitude: 42.074234 gps longitude: -74.048584  0115hrs.  i felt that it was not a plane, did not behave like a satellite, it was not natural to the night sky. it was sphere like.  looked like a star but it was inside the atmosphere.  it was above the cloud deck, but the clouds were low and it was breezy.  i took mental note of the time.  then the next day, about now 3pm, i saw on the news blog on aol a ufo sighting over the netherlands occurred yesterday with video.  i looked at the video and determined it was almost exactly what i saw last night.  decided to make this report for the records.  thanks for reading my observation.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Overhead sighting. intermittent low clouds. dark night. stars, no moon. observed starlike object moving very slowly. it shimmered white light. low to high intensity. it moved, stopped, hovered, changed direction, oscillated in place, moved again.

content.detailedDescription:
Something happened to my husband.It just recently came to my mind about the night he came home and was soooo scared and told me the story about the white light.About a month after this incident my husband became very ill.He has had every test in the world and they say they find nothing.He lost a total of 55 lbs and i never even gave a thought to what had happened to him that night until today.I remembered how scared he was and how quickly he became ill afterwards.It lasted for about 8 months and he has slowly begun to get better.If regular and specialist doctors can't explain what's happened to my husband,..Then maybe you can.He saw something that night that scared him profusely,..Yet today,...He does not seem worried at all about what happened,...Or even why he was so sick,...He is just happy to be returning to normal.So the story goes,...He comes in the house shaking like a leaf,...His eyes were full of tears,..(and my hubby dont cry)he says "baby i need to tell you something and i need you to believe me"i say "ok"
he says,"i was driving home from school and you know how this road is totally dark?" i say yeah baby what happened.He says,i was driving along and coming around the last curve before our turn and this bright ball of light came out of the woods and straight across my windshield,...I thought it was gonna crash through the window but it was moving too fast.I told him it was probably a spirit.We left it at that and never spoke about it again until today.Something happened to my husband that physically caused him to become ill.We want answers!That's all.Some kind of explanation for what happened to him.
content.summary: My husband had a strange experience where a white light came from the woods and hit his windshield.Afterwards he became very ill with no physical explanation.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my brothers was walking from the store on melson avenue in jacksonville florida. when me and my brothers left the store my younger brother noticed the saucer like object above the powerlines.There was no trace or sound or anything so i didnt know it was right above us until he said what is that? and me and my brother started to throw rocks at it..We could hear the rocks hitting the flat-black metal.I always thought the ufo was getting power from the power lines but there was no noise or anything to prove that.And while we was throwing rocks at the object it angled twoards the sky and took off at the speed of light.And mean while my older brother and our friends went to hide.Every since then its changed my beliefs. i would take a lie detector in front of anyone to prove that i saw a ufo..
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Ufo appeared to be getting power from the powerlines 7 witnesses.Then took off at the speed of light

content.detailedDescription:
I am a cna working for sunshine villa in santa cruz.  at 11:00 p.M., i was waiting with a co-worker for my husband to pick me up after my shift.  i was facing north when my co-worker exclaimed, "what is that?"  i turned to look south, toward the ocean, and a huge object was passing overhead, approximately 50 feet above us, moving north. it passed quickly, much faster than any small plane i'd ever seen.  it had a dull metallic bottom, like aluminum or titanium, and there were lights around the edge.  it was silent.

the object disappeared toward the mountains north of santa cruz. i was astonished to see the thing and can't figure out what it could be.  i told my husband that night and since then, he saw something on tv about usos.  santa cruz is on the edge of a deep trench and my husband thinks it may have come from there. the ones on tv matched the description of the thing i saw and he thinks i should tell someone.  so, i'm telling you.  

my son-in-law apparently saw something very similar when he was only six years old that he said hovered over redwood trees when he and my husband lived on an isolated parcel in scotts valley, ca., but he doesn't want to talk about it.
content.summary: Large circular object passed over sunshine villa parking lot at 11:00 p.M.

content.detailedDescription:
I was staying with a friend and around midnight i couldn't sleep so i got up made a cup of coffee and took it to the dock.  i was sitting waiting for the coffee to cool a little when i noticed flashing lights on the lake.  i looked up and saw a round object slowly moving over the tree tops then it came down and hovered over the lake.  the nearest part of the saucer was no more than 70-75 feet from me.  it looked as though it could house no more than two to four people my size.
the lights flashed then pulsed i didn't understand what it wanted.  but i heard myself say aloud "okay"..Then the next thing i remember is sitting back on the dock and my coffee was cold.  i watched the object slowly rise to the tops of the trees and zip it was gone.  i walked back into the house and looked at the clock it was about 1:35 a.M.  i told noone back then if i had said anything about it i would have been placed in a mental hospital and called crazy.
many years later around 1988-89 i quit smoking and gained quit a bit of weight at that time i noticed small grooves in both arms as if tissue had been removed.  i checked and found two scar like patches one on each arm, resembling a polio vaccination, but much lower.  why hadn't i noticed them before i wondered.  well for one thing they are in an area not easy to look at, on the back of the arms.  was i affraid "no" i curious, i was more interested in the object and what was inside than affraid.
content.summary: Like two coffee cup saucers with a round metal rotating flashing object in between saucers

content.detailedDescription:
My name is harold melton.  i am 66 years old living in jacksonville, nc

approximately five years ago it was noticed that i have a very small piece of (metal) embedded in my left hip.  it is small and square in shape showing brightly on an x-ray.  this discovery was the result of an x-ray at a chiropractor's office.  

i asked what it might be and the doctor had no idea but supposed i had been hit with shrapnel while in combat.  no, i served but was never in combat.  

just last year i had another x-ray and the object is still visible.

are there individuals out there still interested in this? 
thanks.  harold melton
content.summary: Metal in hip

content.detailedDescription: I was driving north on highway 495 in massachusetts back in 1997.  i was on my way to work and it was 2pm.  there were no clouds in the sky and the sun was out.  what i saw was triangular in shape and had lights at each corner.  the main body of the object was invisible and only the 3 lights at each corner were visible.  the lights were so bright that they compared to the brightness of the mid-day sun.  i watched the object rotate and hover for several minutes while driving.  at first i thought i must be seeing things, so i slowed down and stopped in the breakdown lane.  i watched the ufo slowly rotate and hover for serveral minutes.  then it accelerated at a speed that nothing man made can do!  it took off straight out of the earth's atmophsere in a fraction of a second.  i have seen just about every flying vehicle man has to offer...I have been to space shuttle launches...And after that day it was clear to me that...Someone/something out there can move around the galaxy/universe as easily as we drive to the corner store!  this experience scared the hell out of me and i did not tell anyone for years for fear of ridicule.  my best guess is that this ufo was just watching us.
content.summary: I know that i saw a ufo!

content.detailedDescription:
We have been observing dis phenomenon from last 1month. first we didnt knw time as wen it takes place....But later we started predicting it....We were lookin in one direction we knew there were no stars there..Its was clean patch...But suddenly bright ball of light like star shaped(only came to knw about sahpe wen it gave light) and then in like 3 secs the light went off and it took off....Towards west....And direction are linear or staright it moves up dwon left rite....It is amazing....Left everybody speechless....And after that things ahppens there are travelling stars(thats wat i call em) and they come from every possible direction. and covers the entire horizon frm north to south or vice vers in like mins.....Its amazing and unexplained!!I dont knw if it is alien ship or wat?? but wateva it is >>guys i promise u wudnt have seen it before.......Time to spot all dis activities is around 4 to 6.
btw guys i m doing dis everyday since jan 2012 and i end up seein atleast 6 to 7 travellin stars. it takes satellites out of question coz they are at super speed. please somebody letme know wat dis is.
content.summary: It is sometihing that left me speechless

content.detailedDescription: When i got home from i felt like i was being watched i stopped and looked up looking at the stars when i noticed the first flash , i first thought it was a plane but it didnt move then maybe a satlitte or something still no movement at a few more bright flahes i could see the object seemed to be circle in shape and very high up one more flash then it disappered
content.summary: Very bright flash from very high up

content.detailedDescription: En mi casa preparando mis maletas para viajar a africa mi novia me dijo q mirara al cielo y vi 7 luces en formacion circular emanando fuertes luces que cambiarton de color entre el azul, amarillo ,rojo ,verde, naranja, blanco . dos de las luces rompieron formacion y se alejaron muy rapidamente en direcciones opuestas luego el resto de la formacion giro sobre su propio eje con las manecillas del relog y siguieron su recorrido juntas de norte a sur ver el video pues en china se filmo uno identico solo que este es a la luz del dia http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=57qqeo7ltma - http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=7arfdw8zjk4&feature=related el primer video es mi filmacion mi nombre es oscar dario franco
content.summary: 7 ovjetos en formacion de circulo http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=57qqeo7ltma

content.detailedDescription: I had just gone to bed between midnight and 1:00 a. m. there was a light rain earlier about 10:00p.M. this was my third night in house and same room without curtains. this night however was different, as the previous two nights had been dark enough you could not make out objects other than occasional stars. this night 3/22/2012 when i turned out the lights and adjusted to dark it appeared as if flood lights were coming from below, the trees were so lit up you could see full detail of each one. you could also see clouds some very white others darker varying colors of grey. the room i was in i believe faced mostly east toward lake tahoe. i then noticed a flashing which at first seemed like a lightening flash but not exactly. the longer i watched it appeared to be a constant faint flash every few seconds. i ran into my sister in - law's room and asked her if she ever experienced lightening without thunder, she said only in summer. this was on 3/22/2012 far from summer. she said she did not see it on the other side of the house, so if i wanted to sleep in her room i could. i felt stupid for being scared so i told her no, i think i will be okay. i have never seen anything like this before, it was nowhere near the full moon and so i could not explain the bright light so far from town. i asked her if there was an airport nearby that might have a rotating light. she said yes to airport, no to any lights. she also witnessed what i am describing. when she went back to her room i tried to convince myself that it must be lightening. i must admit though i have never seen lightening that held a steady pattern of frequency like this. as i lay there suddenly i heard what sounded like very loud humming, almost like a military jet. yet, it was not moving it seemed to be directly overhead. at that point i jumped out of bed and ran across the house to her room (large house)and told her what was happening and that i was going to sleep in her room. i had such horrible dreams when i finally did get to sleep that i woke up in a sweat, my palms were filled with water. it took me forever to get back to sleep because when i got up and went into her bathroom i saw something i don't know what..I really did not want to know what outside on the deck. she has two cats and the big male went into the bathroom and just stared out as if he saw something too. he the went into the living room and looked outside again from that direction, still looking at the same area of the deck. i have never been so afraid in my life, and i have had headaches everyday since. normally all i have to do is take a couple of ibuprofen, but this is not working. my fore head and sides of my head just throb. i have no idea what it was, but i know it was not lightening. i never saw any type of object in the sky just the light followed by the noise.
content.summary: Low clouds, bright light low to ground. flashing light above tree line. then very loud military jet like sound above house.

content.detailedDescription: Witnessed it the night before while in bed, bright white pulsating light that moved like a firefly in every direction hovering over dc. spotted again the next night doing the same thing then disappeared. there were also 3 white stationary bluish lights of equal distance from each other nearby.
content.summary: Bright lights in the sky over dc

content.detailedDescription: These are more videos from a different camera. i uploaded to you videos from my fuji, thinking that the other videos from my sony would not be clear in that i could not see them through the viewfinder while recording this object. this saturday morning i had seen multiple objects as i do every clear night, and was about to come in side after all the stars were gone, but stayed out longer to play with the dogs. i saw in the north sky a white star like orb rise above the tree line, and stay there. it then went in a westerly direction a "few inches" from my perspective. it then began to slowly head in a south easterly direction, and was in the sky for at least 1 hour and 15 minutes. at one point in an attached video, as i was looking through the viewfinder of camera #2, the sony, i could not see the object, so i didn't think it would work, however, last night march 26, 2012, i viewed the footage from the sony and found in this one clip where i did not have a visual by eye on it, footage shows it did not stay in one place on its path towards the east, but momentarily went north, and then continued back in the easterly direction. on at least one still shot, when zoomed in, the object does not look round, but rather oval. i would like to send you more videos and pictures, but your current settings allow only 3, so please advise.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo more vids wainscott east hampton ny daytime march 24, 2012 in sky for approx 1hr 15 mins

content.detailedDescription: These are more videos from a different camera. i uploaded to you videos from my fuji, thinking that the other videos from my sony would not be clear in that i could not see them through the viewfinder while recording this object. this saturday morning i had seen multiple objects as i do every clear night, and was about to come in side after all the stars were gone, but stayed out longer to play with the dogs. i saw in the north sky a white star like orb rise above the tree line, and stay there. it then went in a westerly direction a "few inches" from my perspective. it then began to slowly head in a south easterly direction, and was in the sky for at least 1 hour and 15 minutes. at one point in an attached video, as i was looking through the viewfinder of camera #2, the sony, i could not see the object, so i didn't think it would work, however, last night march 26, 2012, i viewed the footage from the sony and found in this one clip where i did not have a visual by eye on it, footage shows it did not stay in one place on its path towards the east, but momentarily went north, and then continued back in the easterly direction. on at least one still shot, when zoomed in, the object does not look round, but rather oval. i would like to send you more videos and pictures, but your current settings allow only 3, so please advise.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo more vids wainscott east hampton ny daytime march 24, 2012 in sky for approx 1hr 15 mins

content.detailedDescription: One night standing in the alley of my apartments smoking, i noticed a strange light above the houses across the street. what caught my eye was the object looked so big and bright, like a top hat on fire.  i knew i had never seen this light before.  keep in mind i just started smoking my cigarette. still watching it, it appeared to be moving slowly almost dancing.  it again stopped and changed color and shape and hovered above me. i finished my smoke and immediately lit up another amazed by what i was seeing. not sure how long it was but i watched it and finished my second cigarette. shortly after that it began a zig zag pattern in the sky, blinking in and out. one minute really close then blink and it was really far away, but the oddest thing is it was dripping red fireballs every time it would appear then disappear. also i actually had this happen two more times that year and was able to get people from the complex to see it as well. and each time it seemed that two planes would always show up flying very fast before it would blink it self across the sky. i just need some feed back. even people who seen it won't except it and everyone else thinks i am nuts.  please say someone else knows what i am talking about.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Standin in an alley smoking i seen a glowing top hat shaped object. it hoverd for a period of time blinked appeared above me.  droped what look like melting fireballs. shortly after blinked zigzag and was gone.

content.detailedDescription:
Traveling northbound on eglin parkway almost to the intersection of racetrack road and eglin parkway, we noticed several really bright red-orange lights sitting stationary due north towards eglin afb/ crestview.  lights were bright and abnormal enough for us (and another car in front of us) to pull off the road into a parking lot to watch.  we watched for about 10 minutes. they did not mov.  then, they faded out.  
we went home (about a block away) at the foot of the shalier bridge.  we went out on our back deck, and the lights re-appeared.  we watched again for approx 30 minutes.  when they faded out, it seemed as though the row of lights went out one at a time.  there was also clouds in the sky.  when the clouds passed in front of the objects, it lit up the clouds.  
lights were very bright.  
about a week later (we were out of town), a few of our friends and family observed the same lights in the same vicinity.
content.summary: Static orange glowing lights at approx 2-3 miles away

content.detailedDescription: It was 8:45pm when i was sitting on my deck when i saw three orange shaped orbes being trailed by flashing strobes.  i went in the house to get my wife and kids to look at it.  they too witnessed it.  the whole formation was moving from east to west. i said to them what is all the flashing lights following the orange orbes. my wife and kids just brushed it off thinking it was some sort of military crafts but i did not think so. we do live near whiteman afb and skyhaven but that was not it. the movement of the objects were moving slower than a helicopter, jet or plane.
content.summary: 3 balls of orange light traveling in a v formation being trailed not far behind by flashing strobes

content.detailedDescription:
Traveling northbound on eglin parkway almost to the intersection of racetrack road and eglin parkway, we noticed several really bright red-orange lights sitting stationary due north towards eglin afb/ crestview.  lights were bright and abnormal enough for us (and another car in front of us) to pull off the road into a parking lot to watch.  we watched for about 10 minutes. they did not mov.  then, they faded out.  
we went home (about a block away) at the foot of the shalier bridge.  we went out on our back deck, and the lights re-appeared.  we watched again for approx 30 minutes.  when they faded out, it seemed as though the row of lights went out one at a time.  there was also clouds in the sky.  when the clouds passed in front of the objects, it lit up the clouds.  
lights were very bright.  
about a week later (we were out of town), a few of our friends and family observed the same lights in the same vicinity.
content.summary: Static orange glowing lights at approx 2-3 miles away

content.detailedDescription:
Traveling northbound on eglin parkway almost to the intersection of racetrack road and eglin parkway, we noticed several really bright red-orange lights sitting stationary due north towards eglin afb/ crestview.  lights were bright and abnormal enough for us (and another car in front of us) to pull off the road into a parking lot to watch.  we watched for about 10 minutes. they did not mov.  then, they faded out.  
we went home (about a block away) at the foot of the shalier bridge.  we went out on our back deck, and the lights re-appeared.  we watched again for approx 30 minutes.  when they faded out, it seemed as though the row of lights went out one at a time.  there was also clouds in the sky.  when the clouds passed in front of the objects, it lit up the clouds.  
lights were very bright.  
about a week later (we were out of town), a few of our friends and family observed the same lights in the same vicinity.
